explanation: [0-0] A small monkey wearing yellow clothes and a white hat is standing backward on a bunch of green bananas hanging from a banana tree. The monkey is holding a sickle with a green handle, and the blade of the sickle is cutting into the stem of the banana tree. The monkey is surrounded by lush green plants.
[0-8] The monkey continues to hold the sickle tightly, standing on the bananas and slightly adjusting its body, then hugs the stem of the bunch of bananas.
